item.colonies_maidcitizen.npc_tool.desc:
§7- Right-click on a resident to change skins, and Shift right-click on a resident to toggle the rendering of the maid model of a townsman
§7- Currently, these settings can only be changed if the permission is set to Officer or Owner
config.colonies_maidcitizen.render.use_t: This is the master control for rendering the rendering of the inhabitants using the maid model
